'''''gwathui''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word,<ref name=PM/> likely meaning "shadowy" (cf. ''[[gwathren]]'').<ref name=Hiswe/>

== Etymology ==

*[[Sundocarme|Root]] [[WATH]]<ref>{{VT|42a}}, p. 9</ref>

== Compounds ==

*''[[Dunlendings|Gwathuirim]]'' (''gwathui'' + ''[[rim]]'')<ref name=PM>{{PM|X}}, p. 330 (note 76)</ref><ref name=Hiswe>[http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/sindar/dict-sd-en-strict.html Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] (accessed 31 December 2010)</ref>

== Cognates ==

*Sindarin ''[[gwathren]]''
*Sindarin ''[[gwath]]''
